short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily convert between U.S. customary units and metric units with this simple and intuitive tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Global Convert simplifies unit conversion between U.S. customary and metric systems. This intuitive extension is designed for seamless, quick conversions without additional hassle. Whether you need to convert inches to centimeters or Fahrenheit to Celsius, Global Convert has got you covered.
Key Features:
Convert units of length, weight, temperature, and more
Automatic updates upon changing unit types
Lightweight and optimized for minimal resource use
Simple, user-friendly interface
Perfect for students, travelers, engineers, or anyone dealing with cross-border measurements. Just enter the value, select the unit type, and get results instantly!
